stories.original_headline: Tiny earthquakes are revealing a dangerous secret beneath California
stories.original_summary: Scientists are uncovering a hidden and surprisingly complex earthquake zone beneath Northern California by tracking swarms of tiny earthquakes that are far too weak to feel. These faint tremors are revealing what lies beneath the surface where the San Andreas fault meets the Cascadia subduction zone
stories.fantasy_headline: Earth Mages Uncover Slumbering Power Beneath Western Coastlands
stories.fantasy_story: The Earth Mages' Guild has been tracking tiny, unseen shivers deep below the Western Coastlands. Their ancient instruments reveal a complex network of unstable earth where the Great Rift meets the Sunken Realm Border. These faint tremors hint at a powerful, hidden magic stirring beneath the land.

stories.original_headline: The Setapp Mobile iOS store is shutting down on February 16th
stories.original_summary: Setapp Mobile seemed like one of the many alternative app markets with promise that launched in the wake of the EU's Digital Markets Act (DMA). While the law may have forced Apple to allow third-party app stores on its devices, it couldn't make users actually embrace them. MacPaw, the Ukrainian deve
stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Scroll Market to Close Its Gates Next Moon-Cycle
stories.fantasy_story: The MacPaw Clan of Scribes announced their Enchanted Scroll Market will close its gates next moon-cycle. Despite the Grand Council's Edict permitting new scroll vendors, the Royal Scribe's Guild still holds sway over most users. Many hoped for more variety in magical artifacts, but this market struggled to find its footing.
